attributes.action: Excess baggage allowances should include the weight of the carrier
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many regular flyers, who regularly get charged excess baggage under the premise that it is justified due to the cost of flying the extra weight feel that the weight of the carrier must be taken into account when calculating these charges on the premise that overweight people cost more to transport. At the same time people who carry excess baggage, but keep themselves in a fit state should be given a more realistic allowance.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
